text.emotional: My sister and I, we grew up with animals on the farm, as you probably know by now. [sadness,low]No dinosaurs, though[/sadness]. [happiness, medium]Only chickens - but close enough.[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} my sister and i {....} we grew up with animals on the farm {....} as you probably know by now {....} no dinosaurs though {....} only chickens {...} but {...} close enough {..}
